focus.reason: It is the only active project and is at 0%, requiring foundational work to initiate progress.

suggested_project.title: Dreams and Machines
suggested_project.description: A collection exploring the intersection of dreams and machinery, delving into surreal landscapes where technology and subconscious blend.
suggested_project.based_on: Recurring themes of dreams (2 pieces) and machines (1 piece) suggest a potential for expansion into a thematic collection.

decisions: Prioritize foundational work on 'Echoes of the Ocean and Time' to start project progress.
Bias next creation toward project work to build project momentum and maintain target balance.
Identify 'Dreams and Machines' as a potential new collection based on recurring themes for future activation when allowed.
Monitor for the opportunity to initiate new projects as the active project progresses.
